synopsis: In this engaging episode of 'Pineapple Blunt Rotation,' hosts Devam and Ahir, along with their guest Gara, delve into the complexities of breakups, exploring personal experiences, emotional growth, and the journey toward healing. Through candid discussions, they share insights on love, self-discovery, and the importance of self-compassion, creating a relatable and uplifting conversation for anyone navigating similar challenges.
quotes: You have to learn how to listen to yourself instead of getting pulled in every direction possible by your anxious brain.
Every day is an opportunity to choose happiness, even if it feels like an uphill battle.
Just because something isn't perfect doesn't mean it doesn't have value.
You have to be the main character of your own story; otherwise, you're just floating.
Sometimes, you have to trick yourself into not thinking about it.
It's okay to feel sad; give it the respect it deserves and then let it go.
The point is to just live, because you can't assign some all-powerful meaning to everything.
You can still enjoy a floppy pizza even if it's not perfect.
The body has a memory of its own; it feels confused when you're not taking care of yourself.
You are the sky, not the storm.
